text: Martin Ove Roseth (born 10 July 1998) is a Norwegian footballer who plays as a defender for 1. divisjon club Sogndal . He hails from Volda and appeared for Volda TI's senior team in 2013 and 2014 before joining Molde's youth setup. He made his Molde first-team debut in a May 2016 cup game against Stjørdals- Blink, and his league debut in August 2016 against Bodø/Glimt.Fotball.no ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {|
